original_title: Sri Lankan rupee at 304.10/30 to US dollar, bond yields open flat
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 304.10/30 against the US dollar in the spot market on Wednesday, dealers said while bonds yields were unchanged.
The Sri Lanka rupee closed at 304.30/90 against the US dollar in the spot market on Tuesday stronger from 306.30/50 rupees a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 26.80/27.00 percent unchanged from Tuesday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted closed at 29.00/30.00 percent, down from 29.25/30.00 percent at last close.  (Colombo/May23/2023)
